com.gwtext.client.widgets
Class View

java.lang.Object
  Widget
      com.gwtext.client.widgets.BaseExtWidget
          com.gwtext.client.widgets.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsonView
public class View
extends BaseExtWidget

Create a "View" for an element based on a data model or UpdateManager and the supplied DomHelper template. This class also supports single and multi selection modes.
